com.ikalagaming.gui

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • com.ikalagaming.gui.Console
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Package, Listener, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Console
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
implements Package, Listener
    A simple console.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Method Detail

      • appendMessage

        public void appendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Adds a String to the bottom of the console. Removes the top lines if/while they exceed the maximum line count.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to append

      • disable

        public boolean disable()
        Description copied from interface: Package
        Deactivates the package and halts all of its operations. The package is still loaded in memory but not active. Calls Package.onDisable().
        Specified by:
        disable in interface Package
        Returns:
        true if the package has been successfully disabled

        Returns:
        true if the package was successfully enabled
